# uptime_check_groups (Data Source)

Retrieve a list of all check groups configured in your Uptime.com account. Check groups combine multiple checks into a single logical unit.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `check_groups` (Attributes List) List of all check groups in the account (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--check_groups))
- `id` (String) Placeholder identifier for the data source

<a id="nestedatt--check_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `check_groups`

Read-Only:

- `config` (Attributes) Configuration for the check group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--check_groups--config))
- `contact_groups` (List of String) List of contact group names assigned to this check group
- `id` (Number) Unique identifier for the check group
- `include_in_global_metrics` (Boolean) Whether to include this check group in global metrics
- `is_paused` (Boolean) Whether the check group is currently paused
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the check group
- `notes` (String) Notes or description for the check group
- `sla` (Attributes) SLA configuration for the check group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--check_groups--sla))
- `tags` (List of String) List of tags assigned to this check group

<a id="nestedatt--check_groups--config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `check_groups.config`

Read-Only:

- `down_condition` (String) Condition that determines when the group check is considered DOWN
- `response_time` (Attributes) Response time calculation settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--check_groups--config--response_time))
- `services` (List of String) List of check names included in this group
- `tags` (List of String) List of tags used to filter checks for this group
- `uptime_percent_calculation` (String) Method used to calculate the group's uptime percentage

<a id="nestedatt--check_groups--config--response_time"></a>
### Nested Schema for `check_groups.config.response_time`

Read-Only:

- `calculation_mode` (String) Response time calculation mode
- `check_type` (String) Check type for response time calculation
- `single_check` (String) Single check for response time calculation



<a id="nestedatt--check_groups--sla"></a>
### Nested Schema for `check_groups.sla`

Read-Only:

- `latency` (Number) Response time SLA target in seconds
- `uptime` (Number) Uptime SLA percentage target
